name: Fury Road (CodeyHuntting)
description:
Welcome to Fury Road!  Race your way across this desert wasteland with players from all over the world!  How fast can you go?

This project with built with the help of two trusted fellow students at UCI:

Christian Bond-Flasza: https://github.com/christianbond

Amen Wondwosen: https://github.com/amen-wondwosen

DISCLAIMER: we do NOT own the music in this, it belongs to the makers of Sonic Riders on the GameCube
